name: California Consulting, LLC
tagline: The State's Premier Grant Writing Firm
description:
Since 2004, California Consulting, LLC has established a reputation for hard work and bringing success to its clients in the areas of competitive grant writing. California Consulting is the fastest growing grant writing company in the State.
The grant writing team at California Consulting brings with them years of competitive grant writing experience and nearly 630 state and federal grants successfully approved for clients.
